course.subject: FINA
course.name: HKUST Student-Managed Investment Fund (B)
course.description: The course provides students with opportunities to gain hands-on experience in securities research and portfolio management. Students will manage HKUST Student-Managed Investment Fund (SMIF), and make investment decision to invest into the Hong Kong listed companies. While the same stock selection process is to be followed as in FINA 4713, students will be assigned to submit research reports on completely different industry sectors and companies according to the prevailing market environment. Instructor's approval is required for enrollment in the course.
course.prerequisites: ACCT 2010 AND (ECON 2103 OR ECON 2113 OR ECON 2913) AND FINA 3103
